occupation: 🔥We help B2B companies generate leads and brand awareness through Podcasting |🎙MAYOR of Podcast Town 🎧 | Host of the Journey to Mastery Podcast 🔥
headline: 🔥We help B2B companies generate leads and brand awareness through Podcasting |🎙MAYOR of Podcast Town 🎧 |  Host of the Journey to Mastery Podcast 🔥
summary:
I am amazed at the power of connection and how impactful building authentic relationships can be.

I was raised in a small town (Mounds) in Southern Illinois that had one grocery store +  one gas station (technically ... two ... kind of) ... with a total population of a whopping 636 people.  I don't say this as a negative thing. I love my hometown and I'm proud to be a BOBCAT (IYKYK)! I say it to make it known that no matter where you come from, you can make it!

I have had the opportunity to have conversations and learn from the brightest minds in the world. 

I want to pay that wisdom forward. My mission is to give the gift of connection to as many people as possible and use conversation and dialogue to bring change.

My why is to empower people by helping uncover, cultivate and broadcast their voice to those they were sent to serve.

My calling is telling stories that educate, motivate, inspire, and transform lives and businesses through content audio marketing. I help corporations, entrepreneurs, and brands launch, grow and maximize sales through video and audio content marketing. 

My passion is to partner with brands to build an audio or video podcast brand that is:
Well planned, Well recorded, Well branded, Well managed, Well marketed, Well socialized. 

Podcast Town is an audience growth and monetization company.  

Through demand generation, I partner with B2B brands to leverage the power of video and audio podcasts and live stream shows to drive growth and establish their brand presence. 

My expertise encompasses all aspects of podcasting, from launching and producing engaging content to securing guest appearances and promoting the podcast effectively. 

With a focus on demand generation and monetization strategies, I am dedicated to helping brands transform their podcasting initiatives into revenue-generating channels that fuel long-term success.

You can learn more at our website: https://www.podcasttown.net

Also feel free to tune in to the Enterprise NOW! Show @ https://www.enterprisenow.net

experiences.title: Executive Producer | Host
experiences.description: The ultimate podcast for dynamic, influential entrepreneurs. Here, you'll find practical strategies and valuable insights to hone your skills and achieve your goals. Our mission is to provide clarity, enhance performance, and cultivate a supportive community of ambitious entrepreneurs.

experiences.title: Field Operations Manager
experiences.description:
▪ Developed department KPI’s to ensure operational excellence of field service work performed at customer sites. 
▪ Established and maintained a business culture supported by processes, procedures to ensure that product deficiencies identified by service personnel are reported, allowing continuous improvement opportunities, implementation, and verification of results. 
▪ Managed the service department as a profit center and managed existing capital assets used by the service department and provided justification for expansion/upgrades to produce financial gains.

experiences.title: Electrical Design Engineer
experiences.description:
▪ Maintained budget pricing to ensure that projects were quoted and delivered on time and within budget.
▪ Responsible for design, equipment and material specification, procurement, calculations, drawing development,
engineering evaluations, and construction support for assigned electrical substation and overhead and underground high-voltage transmission line projects.
▪ Supported development and updated Design Engineering Team guidelines, procedures, and quality assurance techniques, which
included leading the development and improvement in a cross-functional team environment.

experiences.title: Electrical Engineer
experiences.description:
▪ Designed, tested, programmed and drafted electrical, controls systems and control panels using Auto cad electrical.
▪ Mastered accurate cost estimating during the bidding process to ensure corporate objectives were met.
▪ Provided information on control systems logic, control panels, and systems in a professional and organized fashion.

recommendations:
Rita Richa



Elzie gets it. He’s kind bright and so knowledgeable about the industry. Collaborating with Elzie is like a breath of fresh air. We get serious work done but still have so much fun while doing it! A thought leader, entrepreneur, and very empathetic individual. I highly recommend him!

Yola Bastos



On our podcast, I had the pleasure of speaking with Elzie, and it seemed like I was talking with an old friend. 
He's sincere, dedicated, and passionate about his mission. Elzie, you're doing an amazing job assisting entrepreneurs with their businesses with your podcast! Well done 👏🏼
